member.name: M:Cars.Controllers.CatalogController.GetModel(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Retrieves the details of an existing car model. You need only supply the unique model identifier that was returned upon model creation.
member.returns: Returns a model object if a valid identifier was provided.

member.name: M:Cars.Controllers.CatalogController.SaveModel(Cars.ModelDto)
member.returns: Returns model object if saving succeeded.

member.name: M:Cars.Controllers.CatalogController.GetBrand(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.remarks: Retrieves the details of an existing car brand. You need only supply the unique brand identifier that was returned upon brand creation.
member.returns: Returns a brand object if a valid identifier was provided.

member.name: M:Cars.Controllers.CatalogController.SaveBrand(Cars.BrandDto)
member.returns: Returns brand object if saving succeeded.
